alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 7:26PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Laramie County through 800 PM MDT... At 726 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over North Cheyenne, or near Cheyenne, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, North Cheyenne, Ranchettes and Frontier Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 12 and 20. Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 368 and 376. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; South Laramie Range Foothills
